description:
**Tool Overview**:

A sample script developed by Microsoft to automate the process of updating the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE) from the running Windows operating system.

***Details***

This script assists system administrators in streamlining the update process to ensure that the WinRE partition is secure and up-to-date. It is specifically useful for Server 2016 and 2019, which are noted to be vulnerable yet lack direct patches from Microsoft. The script facilitates the downloading of the latest Windows Safe OS Dynamic Update from the Microsoft Update Catalog and subsequently applies the WinRE update. By utilizing this tool, administrators can mitigate the security vulnerabilities outlined in CVE-2024-20666 efficiently rather than manually manipulating the update process.

For further detailed instructions, please refer to the associated knowledge base article, KB5034957, which outlines how to successfully implement this automation script.
